title: My Chicken Farm
description:
My Chicken Farm is a clicker game in which you have to breed chickens on a chicken farm that lay eggs for you.
 Collect and sell eggs to buy new chickens and buy new objects to increase the efficiency of earning money.
 You can also put seeds on the field for them, build a monument or even install a music center. And you can also dress up the chicken in different hats. There are 8 types of multicolored hens in the game, which differ in the valuable eggs produced. And also you are waiting for various interesting events that occur during the game.
